mapper.select: SELECT bd.*, bf1.id as origin_id, bf1.feature_id as origin_feature_id, bf1.sprint_id as origin_sprint_id, bf1.pi_id as origin_pi_id, bf1.team_project_id as origin_team_project_id, bf1.rank as origin_rank, bf1.program_id as origin_program_id, bf2.id as depend_id, bf2.feature_id as depend_feature_id, bf2.sprint_id as depend_sprint_id, bf2.pi_id as depend_pi_id, bf2.team_project_id as depend_team_project_id, bf2.rank as depend_rank, bf2.program_id as depend_program_id FROM agile_board_depend bd LEFT JOIN agile_board_feature bf1 ON bf1.id = bd.board_feature_id LEFT JOIN agile_board_feature bf2 ON bf2.id = bd.depend_board_feature_id WHERE bd.program_id = #{programId} AND bd.pi_id = #{piId}
